mapper.update: update kq_usercheckinfo set userid = #{userid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, checkphoto = #{checkphoto,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, checktime = #{checktime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, begintime = #{begintime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, endtime = #{endtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, placeid = #{placeid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, subject = #{subject,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where pkid = #{pkid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select pkid, userid, username, checkphoto, checktime, begintime, endtime, placeid, subject from kq_usercheckinfo where pkid = #{pkid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
